items.check: ma_ttnv not in (select val from options where name = 'm_tt_nghi_viec')

command.text: declare @maxLength int select @maxLength = length from syscolumns where name = 'ma_nv' and id = object_id('hrnv') select 'this._maxLength = ' + ltrim(@maxLength) + ';active$hrRMDecisionFilter(this);' as message return

declare @$exists nvarchar(512), @wsID varchar(8), @outWork varchar(32), @stt_rec_nv varchar(33) select @$exists = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Mã nhân viên %s đã được khai báo trong phần cập nhật thông tin nhân viên.' else N'The Employee ID %s is invalid or already exists.' end

if exists(select * from hrnv where ((ma_nv like rtrim(@ma_nv) + '%') or rtrim(@ma_nv) like rtrim(ma_nv) + '%')) begin select 'ma_nv' as field, replace(@$exists, '%s', rtrim(@ma_nv)) as message return end select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where upper(name) = 'M_WS_ID' select @outWork = rtrim(val) from options where name = 'm_tt_nghi_viec' select @stt_rec_nv = max(stt_rec) from hrnv select @stt_rec_nv = @wsID + case when @stt_rec_nv is null then '000000001' else replace(str(cast(substring(@stt_rec_nv, 2, 9) as bigint) + 1, 9), ' ', '0') end + 'HRM'
insert into @@table select @ma_hs, @stt_rec_nv, @ma_nv, @ma_bp, @ma_vtr, @ma_ttnv, @ngay_vao, @bac_quan_ly, @stt_rec_ql, @stt_rec_tn, @stt, getDate(), getDate(), @@userID, @@userID

if exists(select 1 from @@table where ma_hs = rtrim(@ma_hs) and stt_rec_nv = rtrim(@stt_rec_nv)) begin declare @ma_nv_ql varchar(33), @ten_nv_tn nvarchar(256), @ma_tt varchar(33), @status varchar(33), @statusName nvarchar(511) select @ma_tt = val from options where name = 'm_tt_hs_td' select @ma_nv_ql = ma_nv from vhrnv where stt_rec = @stt_rec_ql select @ten_nv_tn = ten from vhrnv where stt_rec = @stt_rec_tn select @status = case when @ma_ttnv = @outWork then 0 else 1 end select @statusName = case when @@language = 'V' then name else name2 end from hrdirinfo where type = 'RMStatus' and code = @status
-- Employee insert into hrnv (stt_rec, ma_nv, stt, ho_nv, ten_nv, gioi_tinh, ngay_sinh, noi_sinh, cmnd_so, cmnd_noi_cap, cmnd_ngay_hl, cmnd_ngay_hh, quoc_tich, dan_toc, ton_giao, hon_nhan, dien_thoai_dd, email_ca_nhan, dia_chi_ht, ngay_kham, chieu_cao, can_nang, mat_phai, mat_trai, nhom_mau, loai_sk, ghi_chu_sk, ngay_vao, nguoi_tiep_nhan, nguon_tuyen_dung, nguoi_gioi_thieu, tinh_trang_nv, ma_dvcs, bo_phan, bp_ref, vi_tri, bac_quan_ly, nv_ql, ma_nn, bang_cap, diem, ngay_cap_bang, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id, user_id0, user_id2) select a.stt_rec_nv, a.ma_nv, a.stt, b.ho_uv, b.ten_uv, b.gioi_tinh, b.ngay_sinh, b.noi_sinh, b.cmnd_so, b.cmnd_noi_cap, b.cmnd_ngay_hl, b.cmnd_ngay_hh, b.quoc_tich, b.dan_toc, b.ton_giao, b.ma_tthn, b.dien_thoai, b.email, b.dia_chi, b.ngay_kham, b.chieu_cao, b.can_nang, b.mat_phai, b.mat_trai, b.nhom_mau, b.loai_sk, b.ghi_chu_sk, a.ngay_vao, @ten_nv_tn, c.ten_nguon, b.nguoi_gt, a.ma_ttnv, b.ma_dvcs, a.ma_bp, d.bp_ref, a.ma_vtr, a.bac_quan_ly, @ma_nv_ql, b.ma_nn, b.bang_cap_nn, b.diem_nn, b.ngay_cap_nn, @status, a.datetime0, a.datetime2, 0, a.user_id0, a.user_id2 from @@table a with(nolock) left join hrrmhs b with(nolock) on a.ma_hs = b.ma_hs left join hrdmnguontd c with(nolock) on b.ma_nguon = c.ma_nguon left join hrbp d with(nolock) on a.ma_bp = d.ma_bp where a.ma_hs = rtrim(@ma_hs) and a.stt_rec_nv = rtrim(@stt_rec_nv)
-- Working insert into hreqtlvtd (stt_rec, stt_rec0, cong_ty, vi_tri, luong, thoi_gian_lv, ngay_tu, ngay_den, ly_do_den, ly_do_di, ghi_chu, line_nbr, datetime0, datetime2,user_id0, user_id2) select a.stt_rec_nv, b.stt_rec0, b.cong_ty, b.vi_tri, b.luong, b.thoi_gian_lv, b.ngay_tu, b.ngay_den, b.ly_do_den, b.ly_do_di, b.ghi_chu, b.line_nbr, a.datetime0, a.datetime2, a.user_id0, a.user_id2 from @@table a with(nolock) join hrrmqtlvtd b with(nolock) on a.ma_hs = b.ma_hs where a.ma_hs = rtrim(@ma_hs) and a.stt_rec_nv = rtrim(@stt_rec_nv)
-- Test & Interview select top 0 cast('' as char(13)) as stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, ma_ktr, ngay_ktr, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, line_nbr, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #hrektr from hrektr select top 0 cast('' as char(13)) as stt_rec, cast('' as char(3)) as stt_rec0, ma_pv, ngay_pv, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, line_nbr, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #hrepv from hrepv
insert into #hrektr (stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_ktr, ngay_ktr, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, line_nbr, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select rtrim(@stt_rec_nv), '', b.ma_ktr, a.ngay_ktr, b.diem, b.ma_kq, b.trong_so, b.ghi_chu, 1, b.line_nbr, getDate(), getDate(), @@userID, @@userID from hrrmkqktr a with(nolock) join hrrmkqktrct b with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where a.ma_hs = rtrim(@ma_hs) and a.ma_dot = rtrim(@ma_dot) order by a.ma_dot, a.ma_hs, a.ma_vong
insert into #hrepv (stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_pv, ngay_pv, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, line_nbr, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select rtrim(@stt_rec_nv), '', b.ma_pv, a.ngay_pv, b.diem, b.ma_kq, b.trong_so, b.ghi_chu, 1, b.line_nbr, getDate(), getDate(), @@userID, @@userID from hrrmkqpv a with(nolock) join hrrmkqpvct b with(nolock) on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec where a.ma_hs = rtrim(@ma_hs) and a.ma_dot = rtrim(@ma_dot) order by a.ma_dot, a.ma_hs, a.ma_vong
insert into hrektr (stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_ktr, ngay_ktr, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, line_nbr, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select stt_rec, replace(str(id, 3), ' ', '0'), ma_ktr, ngay_ktr, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, id, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2 from #hrektr insert into hrepv (stt_rec, stt_rec0, ma_pv, ngay_pv, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, line_nbr, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select stt_rec, replace(str(id, 3), ' ', '0'), ma_pv, ngay_pv, diem, ma_kq, trong_so, ghi_chu, tag, id, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2 from #hrepv
drop table #hrektr drop table #hrepv update hrrmhs set ma_tt = @ma_tt, status = '1' where ma_hs = rtrim(@ma_hs) end
declare @invoke nvarchar(1024), @stt_rec_hsuv char(13) select @stt_rec_hsuv = stt_rec from hrrmhs where ma_hs = rtrim(@ma_hs) delete hreanh where stt_rec = @stt_rec_nv insert into hreanh (stt_rec, rkey, imagedata) select @stt_rec_nv, convert(varchar(12), lower(replace(newid(), '-', ''))), imagedata from hreanh where stt_rec = @stt_rec_hsuv select @invoke = 'FileUploadExtender.UploadExtender.Process.TranferFiles(hrRMApplicantProfileInput,hrPIGeneralInformation,' + @stt_rec_hsuv + ',' + @stt_rec_nv + ',List,@@appDatabaseName,' + rtrim(@@userID) + ')' select '' as field, '' as message, @invoke as invoke, 'on$hrRMDecisionFilter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(this, ' + @status + N', ''' + replace(replace(isnull(@statusName, ''), '\', '\\'), '''', '\''') + ''');' as script return

script.text: function active$hrRMDecisionFilter(a){a.add_onResponseComplete(on$hrRMDecisionFilter$ResponseComplete);setDefault$hrRMDecisionFilter(a);a.setReadOnlyFields("ma_dot, ma_hs");var b=a.getItem("ma_nv");b.maxLength=a._maxLength;b.focus()}function close$hrRMDecisionFilter(a){try{a.remove_onResponseComplete(on$hrRMDecisionFilter$ResponseComplete)}catch(b){}}function on$hrRMDecisionFilter$ResponseComplete(e,a){var b=a.object,d=a.type.Context,c=a.type.Result;switch(d){case"Checking":objectBehavior$Dir$Irregular.checkCode(b,"ma_nv");break;case"EmployeeM":b.setItemControlBehavior("stt_rec_ql",c[0].Value,true);break;case"EmployeeR":b.setItemControlBehavior("stt_rec_tn",c[0].Value,true)}}function setDefault$hrRMDecisionFilter(a){g=a.grid;a.setItemValues("ma_dot, ten_dot%l, ma_hs, ten_hs%l, ma_bp, ten_bp%l, ma_vtr, ten_vtr%l, ngay_vao, ma_ttnv, ten_ttnv%l",[g._periodCode,g._periodName,g._applicantCode,g._applicantName,g._departmentCode,g._departmentName,g._positionCode,g._positionName,g._dateIn,g._status,g._statusName])}function onchange$hrRMDecisionFilter$EmployeeManager(b){var a=b.parentForm;a.request("Employee","EmployeeM",[["ma_nv","String",a.getItemValue("ma_ql")]],b)}function onchange$hrRMDecisionFilter$EmployeeReceiver(b){var a=b.parentForm;a.request("Employee","EmployeeR",[["ma_nv","String",a.getItemValue("ma_tn")]],b)}function on$hrRMDecisionFilter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(c,b,a){var d=c.grid;d._formScript="show$hrRMDecisionFilter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(this, "+b+", '"+a+"')"}function show$hrRMDecisionFilter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(a,c,b){a._setItemValue(a._activeRow,a._getColumnOrder("status"),c);a._setItemValue(a._activeRow,a._getColumnOrder("ten_status%l"),b);a._focusWhenTabChanged()} &ScriptIrregular;
